mutants.code:
def could_be_name(original: str, another: str) -> bool:
    """
    Determines if the 'another' name could be the same person as the 'original' name.

    Args:
        original (str): The original full name.
        another (str): The name to test against the original.

    Returns:
        bool: True if the 'another' name matches any combination of the 'original' full name, False otherwise.
    """
    if not another.strip():
        return True
    return all((name in original.split() for name in another.split()))

mutants.original_line: return all((name in original.split() for name in another.split()))
mutants.mutated_line: return all((name not in original.split() for name in another.split()))
mutants.code:
def could_be_name(original: str, another: str) -> bool:
    """
    Determines if the 'another' name could be the same person as the 'original' name.

    Args:
        original (str): The original full name.
        another (str): The name to test against the original.

    Returns:
        bool: True if the 'another' name matches any combination of the 'original' full name, False otherwise.
    """
    if not another.strip():
        return False
    return all((name not in original.split() for name in another.split()))
